item.title: Learning From Data - Course Review
item.description: Machine learning students and practitioners looking for a solid foundation on the subject probably heard about Learning From Data, a real Caltech course taught by Professor Yaser Abu-Mostafa and broadcast live, for free. As a contribution to this wonderful initiative, I gather here my impressions regarding some aspects of the course. Prerequisites Basic probability, matrices, and calculus. According to the course website, this is all you need to know. I would add programming to that list though, since it’s necessary to write some tricky programs in order to answer to some questions.
